Package vrielynckpieterjan.masterproef.encryptionlayer.schemes

Class RSACipherEncryptedSegment<DecryptedObjectType extends java.io.Serializable>

java.lang.Object
vrielynckpieterjan.masterproef.encryptionlayer.schemes.RSACipherEncryptedSegment<DecryptedObjectType>
Type Parameters:
DecryptedObjectType - The object type of the decrypted segment.
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, DecryptableSegment<DecryptedObjectType,​java.security.PrivateKey>
public class RSACipherEncryptedSegment<DecryptedObjectType extends java.io.Serializable>
extends java.lang.Object
Class representing an RSA CipherEncryptedSegment.
See Also:
Serialized Form
"Implementation Note:"
This class uses AES encryption to encrypt the original object with and uses RSA encryption to encrypt the used, randomly 32-byte long generated AES key. This is due to the fact that the RSA encryption scheme can't be used to encrypt objects of any length.

    • applyCipherMode

      protected byte[] applyCipherMode​(@NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String instanceName, int cipherMode, byte[] element, @NotNull @NotNull java.security.Key key) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Method to call a Cipher procedure to encrypt / decrypt the provided byte array with the given arguments.
      Parameters:
      instanceName - The name of the encryption method which is used to initialized the Cipher instance with.
      cipherMode - The Cipher mode.
      element - The element to encrypt.
      key - The key to encrypt the element argument with.
      Returns:
      The encrypted element as a byte array.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the provided key could not be used to encrypt the provided byte array with.
      "API Note:"
      The System.exit() method is called if no Cipher instance can be initialized for the provided instanceName argument.
